mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM spot_check_base WHERE team = #{team} and state = '已上报'
AND check_company LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.company},'%') AND sample_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND date >= #{search.start1} AND date <= #{search.end1} AND check_result LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.result},'%') AND sample_person LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.person},'%') AND check_orginization LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.orginization},'%')

SELECT count(1) FROM spot_check_base WHERE 1=1
AND check_company LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.company},'%') AND sample_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND date >= #{search.start1} AND date <= #{search.end1} AND check_result LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.result},'%') AND sample_person LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.person},'%') AND check_orginization LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.orginization},'%')
SELECT * FROM spot_check_base WHERE food_type = #{type} order by id desc

SELECT * FROM spot_check_base
WHERE check_orginization = #{name} order by id desc
